typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filenamea',
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/USQL/*Tweets.csv']) ~> TweetsWildcard
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filenameb',
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/AW/{DimProduct.csv,DimCustomer.csv}']) ~> AWTableFiles
AWTableFiles split(instr(filenameb ,'DimCustomer.csv') > 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> splitOnFile@(Customers, Products)
TweetsWildcard sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> singleSQLTable
